name: We create a login scenario that is used by all api for testing their functionality

testSteps.description:
When User is able to log into application
| email | password |
| systemadmin@marketcube.io | 12345678n@N |
Then user should be able to login to the system and store token

userStory.storyName: API - Login as a registered user
userStory.narrative:
As a registered user
  I want to get logged into on marketcube
  So that I am able to access the platform and manage my inventory
